= Brodmann Areas =

  * BA 1,2,3 - [BrainAreaMCA Primary Somatosensory Cortex (MCA.SSC.S1)]
  * BA 4 - [BrainAreaMCA Motor Cortex (MCA.MC)]
  * BA 5 - [BrainAreaMCA Secondary Somatosensory Cortex  (MCA.SSC.S2)]
  * BA 6 - [BrainAreaMCA Premotor Cortex (MCA.PMC) and  	Supplementary Motor Cortex (MCA.SMC)]
  * BA 7 - [BrainAreaPCA Somatosensory Association Cortex (PCA.SA)]
  * BA 8,9 - [BrainAreaFCA Lateral Prefrontal Cortex (FCA.LPFC)]
  * BA 10,11,12 - [BrainAreaFCA Orbitomedial Prefrontal Cortex (FCA.OMPFC)]
  * BA 13,14,15,16 - monkey only
  * BA 17 - [BrainAreaVCA Primary Visual Cortex (VCA.V1)]
  * BA 18 - [BrainAreaVCA Secondary Visual Cortex (VCA.V2)]
  * BA 19 - [BrainAreaVCA Associative Visual Cortex (VCA.V3)]
  * BA 20 - [BrainAreaVCA Inferotemporal Area (VCA.IT.TE)]
  * BA 21 - [BrainAreaVCA Preoccipital Inferotemporal Area (VCA.IT.TEO)]
  * BA 22 - [BrainAreaACA Wernicke's area A3 (ACA.A3) and Wernicke's area A4 (ACA.A4)]
  * BA 23 - [BrainAreaPCA Posterior Cingulate Cortex (PCA.PCG)]
  * BA 24 - [BrainAreaFCA Anterior Cingulate Cortex (FCA.ACG)]
  * BA 25 - [BrainAreaFCA Subgenual Cortex (FCA.SGC)]
  * BA 26 - [BrainAreaPCA Retrosplenial Cortex (PCA.RSC)]
  * BA 27 - [BrainAreaHCA Presubiculum (HCA.PRS)]
  * BA 28 - [BrainAreaHCA Enthorhinal Cortex (HCA.PH.ET)]
  * BA 29,30 - [BrainAreaPCA Retrosplenial Cortex (PCA.RSC)]
  * BA 31 - [BrainAreaPCA Posterior Cingulate Cortex (PCA.PCG)]
  * BA 32,33 - [BrainAreaFCA Anterior Cingulate Cortex (FCA.ACG)]
  * BA 34 - [BrainAreaHCA Enthorhinal Cortex (HCA.PH.ET)]
  * BA 35 - [BrainAreaHCA Perirhinal Cortex (HCA.PH.PR)]
  * BA 36 - [BrainAreaHCA Posterior Parahippocampal Gyrus (HCA.PH.PPG)]
  * BA 37 - [BrainAreaVCA Fusiform Gyrus (VCA.V4)]
  * BA 38 - [BrainAreaMCA Temporopolar Cortex (MCA.TPC)]
  * BA 39,40 - [BrainAreaACA Wernicke's area A3 (ACA.A3) and Wernicke's area A4 (ACA.A4)]
  * BA 41 - [BrainAreaACA Primary Auditory Cortex (ACA.A1)]
  * BA 42 - [BrainAreaACA Auditory Association Area (ACA.A2)]
  * BA 43 - Gustatory Cortical Area, ignored
  * BA 44,45 - [BrainAreaFCA Broca's Area  (FCA.BRA)]
  * BA 46 - [BrainAreaFCA Lateral Prefrontal Cortex (FCA.LPFC)]
  * BA 47 - [BrainAreaFCA Inferior Prefrontal Gyrus (FCA.IPG)]
  * BA 48 - function unknown, ignored
  * BA 49 - [BrainAreaHCA Parasubiculum (HCA.PAS)]
